title: LG reveals pricing for 2022 OLED TVs, availability starts this month
content:
LG is one of the largest TV manufacturers worldwide, and the company’s lineup of WebOS-powered smart TVs is usually on par (or slightly ahead of) competing options from TCL, Samsung, and other big names. LG revealed a bunch of new TVs earlier this year at CES 2022, and they are arriving in stores starting later

The post LG reveals pricing for 2022 OLED TVs, availability starts this month appeared first on xda-developers.
